title: Enhancing Practical Competencies in Curriculum Development: Customized Problem-Solving Language Education for In-Service Engineers

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic engineering terminology and technical document interpretation skills
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can extract core information from engineering-related technical documents with 80% accuracy.
Learners can independently solve language problems based on real-world work scenarios three or more times.
Learners can enhance communication competencies through peer and self-assessment in team-based problem-solving activities.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
